channel.title: My Perfect Server
channel.description:
[b][u]My Perfect Server[/u][/b]
After playing loads and loads of different servers I've compiled my specs for what I would consider my perfect server. You may not agree. Please tell me if I've left something out or if you disagree with an idea then say why.
75x Exp Rate - People who play these servers have likely already spent a lot of time on other servers and rarely want to do that again.
Sizable Monster Drops - Most drops on servers are pathetic to say the least. Monster drops would be scaled up but not to the extreme, just to make killing monsters worth while.
Original Items Only - People liked the original items, that why they play.
Full P2P Wilderness - I personally don't think having wildy switching is worth while. It seems to cause such a fuss and people enjoy P2P anyway.
No Random NPC's like the Gambling Man (ew). - Stupid pointless NPC's that add nothing to game should go.
Portals in Every City - Walking is way to slow, people want to be able to get around in good time. Of course these would have delays to prevent abuse.
No Master Fisher at all - If fishing is ever going to be helpful at all then Master Fisher must go. People enjoy handouts but it takes away the reward and value of the hand outs.
No Runecrafting Just Monster Drops - Hasn't really ever been helpful in servers, the majority of runes sold are from drops anyway. Only gives another skill to go on the high scores.
Small Amount of Starting Gear - I think a Wooden Shield, Bronze Sword, 50 Minds, 50 Airs, 50 Fires, a Short Bow and 65 Bronze Arrows would be good for starters.
Super Pots in Edge Store - Super Pots in Edge Store for 20k each.
Rune - Rune items would only be available by killing level 80 + monsters or smithing.
Dragon - Only from KBD.
Bloods - From Level 80+ monsters only.
Moderator Status - Application only and decided by the Admin.
Admin Status - There is only one of them ever, full stop, case closed. I hate servers with like 5 Admins in the first few days. Seriously, what the fuck.
Improved training areas - Not new training areas because they always turn out gay, just edits of the originals to make the game less tedious and more interesting.
Anything else I should add?

item.title: My Perfect Server
item.dc:creator: @OldSkoolRSC OldSkoolRSC
item.description:
@OldSkoolRSC wrote:

My perfect server would be a pking server focused on actual pking and not feature the brain dead grinding we all had to go thru on the real RSC

It would have to be released by someone who is a pker and is actualy planning to play his server regularly. he wouldnt open up a suggestions section in forums, changing shit to suit whateva the majority agreed on. Whatever features he implemented would be permenant, this would be done before he opened the server, so all that remained would be bug fixes etc.

Would have to be hosted out of his pocket on a secure dedi straight off the bat for the first month or so, offer non douchey subscription benefits ( no benefits that would give you an unfair advantage ) after a stable player base is established, change the cost of subscriptions each month to cover the server hosting fees ( either lowering or highering the price to accomodate the amount of players purchasing subs), once the hosting fees are paid off, no subscriptions are accepted until the next billing cycle.

It would have a voting reward system in place, regular events , minigames hosted automatically at intevals ( talk to minigame npc, get teleported to a room, 100 chickens are spawned with only a small number carrying a token etc ), all these give tokens which you can trade it for rewards like stat reduction to name changes, pking gear/supplies to a subscription. Obviously the more popular items would require more voting/tokens etc.

There would have to be mods/admins ingame that actually answer your questions and answer them correctly, enough to cover the majority of time zones people play from, the mod/admin accounts would have to be people currently playing the server, both thier pking account and mod account are seen in the online list but when someone pm’s a question to their mod account it gets re-directed to thier pkers account ( they must drop what thier doing and help ) and the reply gets sent back from thier mod account name.

All known Acers perm banned.

Global chat isnt monitored or controlled.

There are no forums, only a bug reporting system.

Servers websites homepage tells you what kind of server it is, what features it has, who its run by, where its hostesd from etc. This is the first thing you see, no searching the whole godam website for this important information.

A seperate website or forums that posts all unexpected downtimes, the reason why its happened and updated as to when its been fixed.

Read full topic
